dict.string: An Alfred Workflow for Quick Access to HC Looker Data ðŸ“Š

# Split the full name of hc1 into first and last names first_name_hc1=$(echo "$hc1" | cut -d' ' -f1) last_name_hc1=$(echo "$hc1" | cut -d' ' -f2)
# Check if both environment variables for hc1 are set and not empty if [ -n "$first_name_hc1" ] && [ -n "$last_name_hc1" ]; then # Create the URL with the appended first and last names for hc1 url_hc1="https://looker.a8c.com/dashboards/477?Report+Date+Start={query}&Upwork+team=English+Language+Support+Team&Upwork+name=${first_name_hc1}+${last_name_hc1}"
# Open the URL for hc1 in a new tab of the specified web browser osascript -e "tell application \"$browser\" to open location \"$url_hc1\"" else # Handle the case where first_name or last_name for hc1 is empty echo "First name or last name for hc1 is missing." fi
# Split the full name of hc2 into first and last names first_name_hc2=$(echo "$hc2" | cut -d' ' -f1) last_name_hc2=$(echo "$hc2" | cut -d' ' -f2)
# Check if both environment variables for hc2 are set and not empty if [ -n "$first_name_hc2" ] && [ -n "$last_name_hc2" ]; then # Create the URL with the appended first and last names for hc2 url_hc2="https://looker.a8c.com/dashboards/477?Report+Date+Start={query}&Upwork+team=English+Language+Support+Team&Upwork+name=${first_name_hc2}+${last_name_hc2}"
# Open the URL for hc2 in a new tab of the specified web browser osascript -e "tell application \"$browser\" to open location \"$url_hc2\"" else # Handle the case where first_name or last_name for hc2 is empty echo "First name or last name for hc2 is missing." fi

[{"title":"Last Week","arg":"last+week","subtitle":"Queries the Last Week"},{"title":"Last Month ðŸ“…","arg":"last+month","subtitle":"Queries the Last Month"}]
Opens All Looker Reports for HCs ðŸ“Š

# Alfred Quick-Looker ðŸ‘€ ## An Alfred Workflow for Quick Access to HC Looker Data ðŸ“Š
### Requirements - [Alfred 5](https://alfredapp.com/)
Alfred 5 is necessary to utilize [Workflow Configuration](https://www.alfredapp.com/help/workflows/workflow-configuration/).
If you see this message, then you're on Alfred 5! ðŸ˜Š
### Features - Browser Selection - Easily add individuals using the [Workflow Configuration](https://www.alfredapp.com/help/workflows/workflow-configuration/). - View Looker reports based on increments of time.
### Roadmap - Looker Dashboard Selection - Group vs. Individual Selection - Additional increments of time.
Opens script based on custom variables in Configure Workflow.
Select the browser you wish to open links in.
Add the first and last name of an HC to search for. Please be sure to add a space beteen the first and last name.
